mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_type, sender_id, receiver_id, message, is_read, create_time) values (#{notice_type}, #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{message}, COALESCE(#{is_read}, 0), #{create_time})
mapper.select: select * from notice where (receiver_id = #{receiver_id} AND notice_type = 0) OR notice_type = 1 order by create_time desc
select * from notice where notice_type = 1 order by create_time desc
